title: Hi, everyone! I'm feeling happy this week
content:
Hi, everyone! I'm feeling happy this week.

Thanks to the sunshine for bringing warmth.

This week, my work continues to focus on ManulifePro. I have mostly completed the front-end tasks, and the interface is nearly finished. Next, it will be deployed to the UAT environment. This process is new to me.

In daily life, I stayed home the past few weekends due to bad weather. This week, I plan to take a short trip, though I haven’t decided where yet.

That's it.
